settings.name: Time (HH:MM:SS)
settings.description: Select if you want to add a time column to your data (TRUE) or not (FALSE)

settings.name: Weekdays (Monday - Sunday)
settings.description: Select if you want to add a weekday column to your data (TRUE) or not (FALSE)

settings.name: Day (dd)
settings.description: Select if you want to add a day column to your data (TRUE) or not (FALSE)

settings.name: Month (mm)
settings.description: Select if you want to add a month column to your data (TRUE) or not (FALSE)

settings.name: Year (yyyy)
settings.description: Select if you want to add a year column to your data (TRUE) or not (FALSE)

references.note: Kranstauber B, Safi K, Scharf A (2023). _move2: Processing and Analysing Animal Trajectories_. R package version 0.2.2.
Garrett Grolemund, Hadley Wickham (2011). Dates and Times Made Easy with lubridate. Journal of Statistical Software, 40(3), 1-25.
Wickham H, François R, Henry L, Müller K, Vaughan D (2023). _dplyr: A Grammar of Data Manipulation_. R package version 1.1.2.
